questions.question_text: Bhagwānnu je ek nimiṣhmātranu darshan te upar ......... viṣhaysukh chhe te sarvene vārīferīne nākhī deīe ane Bhagwānnā ek rommā jeṭalu sukh rahyu chhe teṭalu sukh jo anant koṭi brahmānḍnā viṣhaysukh bheḷā karīe to paṇ tenā koṭimā bhāgnī barobar paṇ thāy nahī.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Sā.1

questions.question_text: Viṣhaynu je sukh chhe te karatā ......... sukh bahu adhik chhe ne te karatā Bhagwānnu sukh e to chintāmaṇi chhe.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 1/26

questions.question_text: Karoḍ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā ......... maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi; ne āpaṇe paṇ karoḍ janma dharyā chhe, paṇ koī vakhat āvo jog maḷyo nathī. Nīkar shu karavā deh dharavo paḍe?
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 1/19

questions.question_text: Ā dehe Bhagwānne bhajī levā, ne deh to hamaṇā paḍashe, māṭe ā to ......... motī parovī levu, tem thoḍāmā kām kāḍhī levu.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 6/77

questions.question_text: Karoḍ kām bagāḍīne paṇ ek ......... sudhārvo ne kadāpi karoḍ kām sudhāryā ne ek mokṣha bagāḍyo to temā shu karyu?
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 1/14

questions.question_text: Māṭe manuṣhya dehnu faḷ to ......... ne swabhāv ṭaḷe, eṭalu ja chhe.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 2/19

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe paṇ e ......... je mukta temanī panktimā bhaḷavu chhe ane Akṣhardhāmmā jaīne akhanḍ Bhagwānnī sevāmā hajūr rahevu chhe, paṇ nāshavant ne tuchchh evu je māyik sukh tene ichchhavu nathī ne emā koī ṭhekāṇe lobhāvu nathī.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Ga.Pr.21

questions.question_text: Āpaṇo janma be vāt sādhavā sāru thayo chhe, temā ek ........., emā deh antarāyrūp chhe; ne bīju Bhagwānmā joḍāvu, temā sang anek prakārnā antarāyrūp chhe. E be khoṭ ṭaḷavī.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 4/99

questions.question_text: “...marī to sarvene javu chhe paṇ āvī rīte ......... e ja jīvyāno moṭo lābh chhe...”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Ga.An.30

questions.question_text: Nāshvant ā deh vadhethi, ......... levu ji, patrāvaane jemi karine, bahaar feki devu ji
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in the kirtan by Narayandas Swami

questions.question_text: “...ati sāche bhāve karīne satsang kare to tene koī jātno doṣh haiyāmā rahe nahī ane ......... thaī jāy.”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Sā.9

questions.question_text: “...jyāre āvo sant-samāgam prāpt thayo tyāre deh mūkīne jene pāmavā hatā te to ......... maḷyā chhe; māṭe jene parampad kahīe, mokṣh kahīe tene chhate dehe ja pāmyo chhe.”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Ga.An.2

questions.question_text: Bhagwāne kahyu chhe je, “Jevo hu satsange karīne vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, ......... sādhane karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 1/17

questions.question_text: Jan pratye jīvan kahe, jene jeṭalo satsang; ........., thāy bāher bhītar bhang.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Bhaktachintamani: 84

questions.question_text: Avani par āvī vahāle, ......... sthāpyo, Hari janoṇe kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj… Akshar 1
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in the kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami

questions.question_text: “Ane satsangī paṇ ene ja kahīe; kem je, satyarūp evo je potāno ātmā tathā satyarūp evā je ......... teno jene āvī rīte sang thayo tene satsangī kahīe.”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Ga.An.39

questions.question_text: “Trīs lakṣhaṇe yukta evā je sant teno je sang te ......... rākhe, to jeṭalā kalyāṇne arthe sādhan chhe teṭalā sarve tenā sangmā āvī jāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Va.4

questions.question_text: Sant samāgam kīje, ho nishdin… ṭek ........., prem sudhāras pīje… Ho 1
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in the kirtan by Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

questions.question_text: “...jem ā līmbaḍānu vṛukṣh chhe te ek vār jāṇī līdhu chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne ......... je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame tadātmakpaṇu kahīe chhīe.”
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Vach.Ga.Ma.14

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe to ......... jāvu chhe evo ek sankalp rākhavo.
questions.explanation: The exact words can be found in Swā.Vāto: 1/301
